setting.name: defaultWidth
setting.label: Default Video Width
setting.hint: This will be used as the default movie width (in pixels) if the width is not specified for the movie.
setting.message: Please enter a numberic value for the Default Video Width.

setting.name: defaultHeight
setting.label: Default Video Height
setting.hint: This will be used as the default movie height (in pixels) if the height is not specified for the movie.
setting.message: Please enter a numberic value for the Default Video Height.

setting.name: displayRelated
setting.label: Display Related Videos
setting.hint: Indicate whether to display thumbnails of related videos after the video is over. Can be overriden within the EmbedVideo tag with the attribute rel:0 or 1 (YouTube videos only).
